price: 127. Waxay leeyihiin Daarta Nabadda (Jannada) Rabbigood agtiis ah, Isagaana ah Gargaarahood waxay camal san falayeen darteed.
arabic: ۞ لَهُمۡ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum dāru al-salāmi ʿinda rabbihim wahuwa waliyyuhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
